ygData.subject: RE: Drinking Buddies (was Re: Are we Hybrids)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m 16 now. ANd they sell it to me, why shouldn t I drink it? My Alcohol Tolerance is up to 45 already! Sarah Heacock   sarah@eskimo.com Meara, level 13
ygData.messageBody:
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Corey de Danann [mailto:corey@...]
>Sent: Saturday, January 22, 2000 9:10 AM

>>Yeah! 18! wooohoo, that's more like it. At least I won't be locked
> up in Crushbone or LowerGuk, or whichever jail they would send me too.

>> So how are you drinking elven wine, if you are only 15? /poke

I'm 16 now.
ANd they sell it to me, why shouldn't I drink it? My Alcohol Tolerance
is up to 45 already!

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 16 Songweaver of Solusek Ro, Mythical Alliance,Test /
Feyre, level 8 Dark Elf Wizard of Solusek Ro, Mythical Alliance, Test /
